channel.title: Projects on Chengyu Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chengyu Zhang

item.title: Real-Time E-commerce Analytics System
item.description: Built a modular real-time analytics platform using Kafka, Spark, Postgres, and Superset for live event ingestion and dashboarding.

item.title: AdApt - Personalized Advertising Tool
item.description: Building a personalized advertising tool leveraging NLP, multimodal data, and automated pipelines for hyper-personalized messaging.

item.title: SQL-like Natural Language Query Interpreter
item.description: Built a Prolog-based interpreter that parses and executes SQL-style natural language queries with logical reasoning.

item.title: Distributed File System Simulator
item.description: Built a fault-tolerant distributed file system using the actor model and ring-based topology.

item.title: Lambda Calculus Interpreter
item.description: Developed a functional interpreter for lambda calculus expressions with support for beta and eta reductions in applicative order.

item.title: Handwriting Digits Recognition
item.description: Achieved high precision in handwritten digit classification through ML optimization.

item.title: Operating Systems Simulation
item.description: Simulated an operating system and optimized CPU scheduling algorithms for performance analysis.

item.title: Wordle Game
item.description: Developed a multi-threaded Wordle server with efficient protocols.

item.title: Campus Connect Hub
item.description: Built a platform for event management and user engagement with Agile/Scrum practices.

item.title: HassPathway - Course Navigation Platform
item.description: Built a tool to simplify and display course data with an intuitive interface.
